title: Pipe Spring National Monument: Squirreltail
body: Squirreltail        Squirreltail NPS   Â    Squirreltail is a perennial bunchgrass 4 to 25 inches tall. It grows in the spring. The grass is green with green to purplish seed clusters drying to yellow by early summer. The grass can be found in elevations between 2000 to 11,500 feet.
